summary: This is an email chain between attorneys discussing scheduling a meeting to propose a briefing schedule for a legal matter, likely related to the Epstein case. The correspondence involves Bruce Barket and other legal professionals coordinating internal discussions before meeting with opposing counsel.

persons.name: Bruce Barket
persons.context: Attorney from Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP who is proposing a meeting schedule and sending the initial email.

persons.name: Tony Ricco
persons.context: Copied on the email from Bruce Barket regarding the proposed schedule.

persons.name: Michael Bachrach
persons.context: Copied on the email from Bruce Barket regarding the proposed schedule.

events.description: Bruce Barket emails colleagues proposing to set up a meeting to discuss a briefing schedule for a legal matter.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated September 20-21, 2019, regarding scheduling a legal meeting.
Bruce Barket, an attorney from Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP, is coordinating the schedule.
The correspondence indicates legal professionals are preparing for discussions with opposing counsel.
The email includes a standard confidentiality notice for attorney-client privileged communications.
